data.title: Books about Genealogy & Family History - Page 4
data.text:
Here is an alphabetical list by topic of books about Genealogy, Ancestors, Family History, Family Trees, Names, and some local histories and other titles of interest to genealogists, compiled by a librarian, that are currently available (in print). Click on the image or title for additional information and availability (purchases are provided by Amazon.com). The list is frequently updated; so check back often.

Contents

| Page 1 | Page 2 | Page 3 | Page 4 |

| Alabama | Arizona | Arkansas | California | Children/K-12 | Colorado | Connecticut | Delaware | District of Columbia | Ethnic & Religious Groups | Family & Surname Lineages | Florida | Foreign Countries | Genealogy - General | Genetics & DNA | Genealogy Ads | Georgia | Hawaii | Heraldry | Idaho | Illinois | Indiana | Iowa | Kansas | Kentucky | Louisiana | Magazines | Maine | Maryland | Massachusetts | Michigan | Minnesota | Mississippi | Missouri | Names | Nebraska | Nevada | New Hampshire | New Jersey | New Mexico | New York | North Carolina | North Dakota | Ohio | Oklahoma | Oregon | Pennsylvania | Rhode Island | South Carolina | South Dakota | Tennessee | Texas | U.S.A. - General | Utah | Vermont | Virginia | Washington | West Virginia | Who's Who | Wisconsin |

South Carolina

Abigail's Story, Tides at the Doorstep: The MacKays, Laroches, Jenkinses, and Chisolms of Low Country, South Carolina, 1671-1897 by William Greer Albergotti A Collection of Upper South Carolina Genealogical and Family Records by James E. Wooley Directories for the City of Charleston, South Carolina, for the Years 1849, 1852, and 1855 by James W. Hagy Directory of Scots in the Carolinas, 1680-1830 by David Dobson Early Edgefield District, South Carolina, Census by Lawrence E. Jarrell Genealogical Abstracts of Edgefield [SC] Equity Court Records by Carol Wells Hidden Glory: The Life and Times of Hampton Plantation: Legend of the South Santee by Mary Bray Wheeler The Hines Bush Family: And Other Related People of Color from Barnwell District, South Carolina 1842-2004 by Wilhelmena Rhodes Kelly The History of Lowndesville, South Carolina by H. A. Carlisle Marriage and Death Notices from the Charleston Observer, 1827-1845 by Brent H. Holcomb North Carolina Land Grants in South Carolina by Brent H. Holcomb Petitions for Land from the South Carolina Council Journals by Brent Holcomb Pickens District, South Carolina, Abstracts of Deed Book C-1: 3rd Deed Book, 1834-1838, with Many Earlier Dates by Linda Cheek

South Dakota

From the Hidewood: Memories of a Dakota Neighborhood (Midwest Reflections) by Robert Amerson Norwegians, Swedes and More, Destination Dakota Territory, Book Four: Benson-Johnson by Loren Amundson

Breitenkamp Deaths in Central Texas, 1925-1934 by Monyene Stearns 1830 Citizens of Texas: A Genealogy of Anglo-American and Mexican Citizens Taken from Census and Other Records by Bill O'Neal Indianola and Matagorda Island, 1837-1887: A Local History and Visitor's Guide for a Lost Seaport and a Barrier Island on the Texas Gulf Coast by Linda Wolff Kerrville Daily Times [Texas] Obituary Index, 1925 to April 30, 1979 by Gloria Clifton Dozier Kings of Texas: The 150-Year Saga of an American Ranching Empire by Don Graham Love Cemetery: Unburying the Secret History of Slaves by China Galland Memorial and Genealogical Record of Southwest Texas by Goodspeed Publishing Company Oleander Odyssey: The Kempners of Galveston, Texas, 1854-1980s by Harold Melvin Hyman Republic of Texas: Poll Lists for 1846 by Marion Day Mullins Roster of Texas Daughters by Texas Society San Elizario: Spanish Presidio to Texas County Seat by Rick Hendricks Ships Passenger Lists Port of Galveston, Texas, 1846-1871 by Galveston County Genealogical Society Tennesseans in Texas by Helen Marsh Texas Cemeteries [hardcover] by Bill Harvey Texas Cemeteries [paperback] by Bill Harvey Texas Graveyards: A Cultural Legacy by Terry G. Jordan Texas Roots by Margaret F. Goynes-Olson Texas Veterans of Czech Ancestry by Czech Heritage Society of Texas Texas Vital Records: Deaths 1968-1998 [CD-ROM] by Ancestry.com War of 1812 Veterans in Texas by Mary Smith Fay Wimberley, Texas: Historic Belle of the Blanco by Dorothy Wimberley Kerbow

U.S.A. - General & Regional Titles

The American Census Handbook [hardcover] by Thomas Jay Kemp The American Census Handbook [paperback] by Thomas Jay Kemp American Prisoners of the Revolution [hardcover] by Danske Dandridge American Prisoners of the Revolution [paperback] by Danske Dandridge The American Resting Place: 400 Years of History Through Our Cemeteries and Burial Grounds by Marilyn Yalom Ancestry Family Historian's Address Book: Guide for Family Historians by Julian Szucs Smith Ancestry in America: A Comparative Guide to over 100 Ethnic Backgrounds by David Garoogian Ancestry's Red Book: American State, County and Town Sources by Alice Eichholz Blood Traitors: The True Saga of Families Torn Apart by the Struggle for Independence in Revolutionary America by Marq de Villiers Bounty and Donation Land Grants in British Colonial America by Lloyd Dewitt Bockstruck The Census Book: A Genealogist's Guide to Federal Census Facts, Schedules and Indexes by William Dollarhide Citizenship Made Simple: An Easy to Read Guide to the U.S. Citizenship Process by Barbara Brooks Kimmel Civil War Muster Rolls (Military Records Collection, 2020) [CD-ROM] by Ancestry.com The Compendium of American Genealogy by Frederick A. Rattermann The Great Migration Begins: Immigrants to New England 1620-1633 [CD-ROM] by Ancestry.com The Handybook for Genealogists: United States of America (10th edition) by Everton Publishers Immigration Made Simple: An Easy-to-Read Guide to the U.S. Immigration Process by Barbara Brooks Kimmel In Tar and Paint and Stone: The Inscriptions at Independence Rock and Devil's Gate by Levida Hileman Indian Wills, 1911-1921: Records of the Bureau of Indian Affairs by Jeff Bowen Land and Property Research in the United States by E.
